text: Hum sirf teri hi ibadat kertay hain aur sirf tujh hi say madad chahatay hain Shuroo Allah kay naam say jo bara meharban nehayat reham kerney wala hai 96.1. Parh apnay rab kay naam say jiss nay peda kiya 96.2. Jiss nay insan ko khoon kay lothray say peda kiya 96.3. tu parhta reh tera rab baray karam wala hai 96.4. Jiss nay qalam kay zariye(ilm)sikhaya
